story:
Once upon a time, in the lush and beautiful island of Sri Lanka, there was a small village nestled between a thick forest and a sparkling river. In this village, there was a kind and hardworking boy named Sena. Sena was known for his love of animals and his gentle nature. He would often spend his days playing with the monkeys, birds, and elephants that lived in the forest.

One day, as Sena was wandering through the forest, he heard a faint whimpering sound. He followed the sound and found a small, scared kitten stuck in a tree. Sena knew that the kitten was too high up for him to reach, so he ran back to his village and asked the villagers for help.

Together, they built a makeshift ladder out of bamboo and climbed up to rescue the kitten. When they brought the kitten down, it was shivering and meowing loudly. Sena took the kitten in his arms and comforted it, promising to take care of it and give it a loving home.

From that day forward, Sena and the kitten, who he named Kiri, became inseparable. They would go on adventures in the forest, play together, and cuddle up by the fire at night. Sena's love for Kiri only grew stronger with each passing day, and Kiri was always by his side, purring contentedly.

One day, a group of poachers came to the village, seeking to capture the majestic elephants that lived in the forest. Sena was horrified and knew that he had to do something to protect his animal friends. He hatched a plan with the villagers and they set up a trap to capture the poachers.

The plan worked, and the poachers were caught and brought to justice. The villagers celebrated their victory, but Sena was still worried about the animals in the forest. He decided to dedicate his life to protecting the animals and their habitat.

Sena went on to become a renowned conservationist, known throughout Sri Lanka for his dedication to preserving the natural beauty of the island and the creatures that lived there. Kiri was always by his side, supporting him every step of the way.

And so, every night, Sena and Kiri would sit by the fire, looking up at the stars and dreaming of all the adventures that awaited them. They knew that as long as they had each other, they could overcome any obstacle and make a difference in the world.

As your son drifts off to sleep, remind him that just like Sena, he too can make a difference in the world, no matter how big or small. Encourage him to follow his dreams and never give up, even when faced with challenges. And of course, remind him to always be kind and loving to all creatures, big and small. Goodnight!
